mapper.select: SELECT ID ,SUBJECT ,CONTENT ,EMAIL ,VIEW_CNT ,TO_CHAR(CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CRT_DT ,TO_CHAR(MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MDFY_DT ,FILE_NAME ,ORIGIN_FILE_NAME FROM BOARD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (ID ,SUBJECT ,CONTENT ,EMAIL ,VIEW_CNT ,CRT_DT ,MDFY_DT ,FILE_NAME ,ORIGIN_FILE_NAME) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_PK.NEXTVAL , #{subject} , #{content} , #{email} , 0 , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , NULL , NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT ID ,SUBJECT ,CONTENT ,EMAIL ,VIEW_CNT ,CRT_DT ,MDFY_DT FROM BOARD WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET VIEW_CNT = VIEW_CNT + 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
